ValidationRule.description: Fields that are required to populate based on Subsidy Type %
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Subsidy_Type__c, 'percentage'), OR( ISBLANK( Subsidy_Percent__c ), ISBLANK( Max_Amount__c ), ISBLANK(Number_of_Pairs_Allowed__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For the selected Subsidy Type, you must input the related values.
